    var body = [];

var bt = new GlideRecord('u_demo_rbi_data');
bt.addQuery('u_ifsc',ifsc_code1);
bt.query();
while(bt.next())
{

	var obj ={

		IFSC : bt.getValue('u_ifsc'),
		name: bt.getValue('u_bank'),
                address: bt.getValue('u_address'),
                branch: bt.getValue('u_branch')


	};
	body.push(obj);



}
response.setBody(body);

)(request, response);]]></operation_script><operation_uri>/api/708337/demo_bank/{code}</operation_uri><produces>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</produces><produces_customized>false</produces_customized><relative_path>/{code}</relative_path><request_example/><requires_acl_authorization>true</requires_acl_authorization><requires_authentication>true</requires_authentication><requires_snc_internal_role>true</requires_snc_internal_role><short_description/><sys_class_name>sys_ws_operation</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-07-16 08:45:41</sys_created_on><sys_id>2eb5ff67471f42103761bb30116d43a6</sys_id><sys_mod_count>25</sys_mod_count><sys_name>IfscDetails</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ws_operation_2eb5ff67471f42103761bb30116d43a6</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-07-22 10:21:42</sys_updated_on><web_service_definition display_value="Demo_Bank">7f253fe3471f42103761bb30116d437a</web_service_definition><web_service_version/></sys_ws_operation></record_update>
